It protects fools, little children, and ships.

Code and Syntax Highlighting

HTML

<ul>
  <li class="nav-item">
    <a class="nav-link" href="/">Home</a>
  </li>
  <li class="nav-item">
    <a class="nav-link" href="about/">About</a>
  </li>
</ul>
`}

img {
  vertical-align: middle;
  border: 0;
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
